item.title: Former Intel CEO Pat Gelsinger Reportedly Expresses Concerns On Potential AI Bubble: ‘We Are Putting Enormous Leverage Into The System’
item.description: During a CNBC interview, Gelsinger noted that an industry shift is currently underway, but companies have yet to materially benefit from it.

item.title: SEALSQ Stock Surges After Cybersecurity Deal With Landis+Gyr Expands To US Facilities
item.description: The company said its IneS Public Key Infrastructure solution will now be implemented in Landis+Gyr’s North American manufacturing facilities.
